headline: Piper Sandler Reiterates “Overweight” on Simon Property (SPG) on Holiday Sales Outlook
summary: Simon Property Group, Inc. (NYSE:SPG) is one of Goldman Sachs’ top REIT stock picks. On July 8, Piper Sandler reiterated its “Overweight” rating on Simon Property Group. The firm expects better-than-consensus holiday sales, driven by retailers preparing with “near-full shelves” for the upcoming holiday season amid ongoing economic growth. The firm noted that Simon Property […]

headline: What to Expect From Simon Property's Next Quarterly Earnings Report
summary: Simon Property will release its second-quarter earnings next month, and analysts anticipate a single-digit FFO growth.

headline: Why CEO Pay Is Always Moving Higher in Fashion — and Corporate America
summary: WWD’s annual study on executive pay found 25 U.S. leaders with pay packages topping $10 million last year.
